title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. the first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label so it cannot contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection is not allowed, so move up/down can only be applied to one item. The signature preview is not a label and does not wrap. The signature preview does not have the same background color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, so move up/down can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview should be a label and should wrap. The signature preview should have the same background color as a hover.
